```{r}
library("here")
library("ggplot2")
library("reshape2")
percentages <- read.table(here("Percentages_other_RNAs"), sep = "\t", header = TRUE)
percent<-data.frame(t(percentages))
RNAs<-percentages[-grep("File", colnames(percentages))]
mRNA<-melt(RNAs, )
```
